## Bayesian mixed effects model

To disentangle seasonal the temporal dynamics in wood growth, respiration and nonstructural carbon reserves from treatment effects, we use a Bayesian mixed effects model. The model includes the fixed effects of time, treatment and height of the stem section and the random effects of tree and an error.
